verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H935>Go<s%> in to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H3068>him,<s%> "This is what Yahweh <S%H559>says,<s%> <S%H5971><s%> 'Let my people <S%H7971>go,<s%> that they may serve <S%H5647>me.<s%>
If you <S%H3986>refuse<s%> to let them <S%H7971>go,<s%> <S%H5062>behold,<s%> I will plague all your <S%H1366>borders<s%> with <S%H6854>frogs:<s%>

and the <S%H2975>river<s%> shall <S%H8317>swarm<s%> <S%H8317>with<s%> <S%H6854>frogs,<s%> which shall go <S%H5927>up<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> into your <S%H1004>house,<s%> and into your <S%H2315>bedroom,<s%> and on your <S%H4296>bed,<s%> and into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and on your <S%H5971>people,<s%> and into your <S%H8574>ovens,<s%> and into your kneading <S%H4863>troughs:<s%>
and the <S%H6854>frogs<s%> shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> both on <S%H5971>you,<s%> and on your people, and on all your <S%H5650>servants.<s%>'"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>"Tell<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H5186><s%> 'Stretch out your <S%H3027>hand<s%> with your <S%H4294>rod<s%> over the <S%H5104>rivers,<s%> over the <S%H5104>streams,<s%> and over the <S%H98>pools,<s%> and cause <S%H6854>frogs<s%> to come <S%H5927>up<s%> on the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>'"

<S%H175>Aaron<s%> stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> over the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and the <S%H6854>frogs<s%> came <S%H5927>up,<s%> and <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
The <S%H2748>magicians<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> the same thing with their <S%H3909>enchantments,<s%> and brought <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H6854>frogs<s%> on the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

Then <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6279>"Entreat<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that he take <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H6854>frogs<s%> from <S%H5971>me,<s%> and from my people; and I will let the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> that they may <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> "I give you the <S%H6286>honor<s%> of setting the <S%H4970>time<s%> that I should <S%H6279>pray<s%> for <S%H5650>you,<s%> and for your servants, and for your <S%H5971>people,<s%> that the <S%H6854>frogs<s%> be <S%H3772>destroyed<s%> from you and your <S%H1004>houses,<s%> and <S%H7604>remain<s%> in the river <S%H2975>only.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4279>"Tomorrow.<s%>" He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Be it according to your <S%H1697>word,<s%> that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> that there is none like <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>

The <S%H6854>frogs<s%> shall <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H1004>you,<s%> and from your houses, and from your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and from your <S%H5971>people.<s%> They shall <S%H7604>remain<s%> in the river <S%H2975>only.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6817>cried<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> concerning <S%H1697>the<s%> <S%H6854>frogs<s%> which he had <S%H7760>brought<s%> on <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and the <S%H6854>frogs<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> out of the <S%H1004>houses,<s%> out of the <S%H7704>courts,<s%> and out of the fields.
They gathered them <S%H6651>together<s%> in <S%H2563>heaps,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H887>stank.<s%>

But when <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that there was a <S%H7309>respite,<s%> he <S%H3513>hardened<s%> his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and <S%H8085>didn't<s%> listen to <S%H3068>them,<s%> as Yahweh had <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>"Tell<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H5186><s%> 'Stretch out your <S%H4294>rod,<s%> and <S%H5221>strike<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> that it may become <S%H3654>lice<s%> throughout all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>'"

They <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H175>so;<s%> and Aaron stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> with his <S%H4294>rod,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and there were <S%H3654>lice<s%> on <S%H120>man,<s%> and on <S%H929>animal;<s%> all the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> became <S%H3654>lice<s%> throughout all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

The <S%H2748>magicians<s%> <S%H6213>tried<s%> with their <S%H3909>enchantments<s%> to <S%H3318>produce<s%> <S%H3654>lice,<s%> but they <S%H3201>couldn<s%>'t. There were <S%H3654>lice<s%> on <S%H120>man,<s%> and on <S%H929>animal.<s%>

Then the <S%H2748>magicians<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> "This is the <S%H676>finger<s%> of <S%H430>God:<s%>" and <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H2388>hardened,<s%> and he <S%H8085>didn't<s%> listen to <S%H3068>them;<s%> as Yahweh had <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "Rise up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh;<s%> <S%H3318>behold,<s%> he comes out to the <S%H4325>water;<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H3068>him,<s%> 'This is what Yahweh <S%H559>says,<s%> "Let my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> that they may serve <S%H5647>me.<s%>

<S%H5971>Else,<s%> if you will not let my people <S%H7971>go,<s%> <S%H7971>behold,<s%> I will send <S%H6157>swarms<s%> of flies on <S%H5650>you,<s%> and on your servants, and on your <S%H5971>people,<s%> and into your <S%H1004>houses:<s%> and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> shall be <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H6157>swarms<s%> of <S%H127>flies,<s%> and also the ground whereon they are.

I will set <S%H6395>apart<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen,<s%> in which my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5975>dwell,<s%> that <S%H1115>no<s%> <S%H6157>swarms<s%> of flies shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H4616>there;<s%> to the end you may <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
I will <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H6304>division<s%> between my <S%H5971>people<s%> and your <S%H5971>people:<s%> by <S%H4279>tomorrow<s%> shall this sign <S%H226>be.<s%>"'"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H935>so;<s%> and there came <S%H3515>grievous<s%> <S%H6157>swarms<s%> of flies into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and into his <S%H5650>servants<s%>' <S%H1004>houses:<s%> and in all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> was <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> by <S%H6440>reason<s%> of the swarms of <S%H6157>flies.<s%>

<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H413>for<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and for <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3212>"Go,<s%> <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to your <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H776>land!<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "It <S%H3559>isn't<s%> appropriate to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2005>so;<s%> for we shall <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> the <S%H8441>abomination<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%> <S%H2076>Behold,<s%> shall we sacrifice the <S%H8441>abomination<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> before their <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H5619>won't<s%> they stone us?

We will <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>' <S%H1870>journey<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> as he shall command <S%H559>us.<s%>"

<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will let you <S%H7971>go,<s%> that you may <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> only you shall not <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H7368>very<s%> far <S%H7368>away.<s%> <S%H6279>Pray<s%> for <S%H1157>me.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3318>"Behold,<s%> I go out from <S%H6279>you,<s%> and I will pray to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> that the <S%H6157>swarms<s%> of flies may <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> from his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and from his <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H4279>tomorrow;<s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> <S%H6547>don't<s%> let Pharaoh deal <S%H2048>deceitfully<s%> any <S%H3254>more<s%> in <S%H1115>not<s%> letting the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%> to <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H6279>prayed<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and he <S%H5493>removed<s%> the <S%H6157>swarms<s%> of flies from <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> from his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and from his <S%H5971>people.<s%> There <S%H7604>remained<s%> not <S%H259>one.<s%>
<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H3513>hardened<s%> his <S%H3820>heart<s%> this <S%H6471>time<s%> <S%H5971>also,<s%> and he didn't let the people <S%H7971>go.<s%>
